WRITING.TEXT:
For first contact when you not sure if the dog is friendly its better to just show it your fist, fingers are better proteced in that positon.
When you know the dog trusts you and you want to give it a treat, put it in your flat hand and let the dog take it from there. Dont hold it between you fingers or the dog can accidentaly bite your fingertips

Driving an affordable and fun car that is also a convertible is really embarrasing, everone can see you enjoying it.
I guess while your neighbor is having fun driving around with his embarrassing car you are just busy being a man full of bile.

Or convert it to electric: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VU8VlgINnio
Wheeler Dealers did a great job with this one, they saved the awesome body and made a reliable and fun car.

Maserati is waiting for ridiculously expensive spare parts...
But to be fair, it is more than twice the age of the Mazda. (But half the mileage - 30k)

WRITING.TITLE: Two convertibles, one is there for annual inspection the other dwells in its natural habitat
